name: Befouled by Satyr
tooltip:
Befouled by Satyr

Slay 7 Hatefury Rogues, 7 Hatefury Felsworn, 7 Hatefury Betrayers, and 7 Hatefury Hellcallers, and return to Takata Steelblade in Desolace.

Requirements:
- Hatefury Rogue x 7
- Hatefury Felsworn x 7
- Hatefury Betrayer x 7
- Hatefury Hellcaller x 7
